alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Mitchell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 4:17PM EDT until September 07 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Southwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Baconton, or 7 miles north of Camilla, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Camilla, Baconton, Doerun, Funston, Sale City, Flint, Ticknor, Minnesota, Cotton, Laney, Lester, Pritchetts, Freeman, Poplar Arbor Church, Hartsfield, Bay, Greenough, and Hinsonton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
